description.raw:
It depends on [this Gazebo_models pull request](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/66/models-for-the-robocup-spl-environment/diff).

* New colors:

    *SkyBlue*: Used in one of the RoboCup09 goals.

    *ZincYellow*: Used in the RoboCup goals nowadays.

    *RedBright*: Used in the RoboCup ball.
    
    Note: The blue and yellow colors are normalized [RAL colors](http://www.ralcolor.com/).

* New textures:

    *Net*: Used in the goals.
  
    *Carpet*: Used in the RoboCup fields.

* New world files:

    *robocup09_spl_field*: Used for image validation and old school RoboCupers

    *robocup14_spl_field*: Current environment.

I've fixed the indentation in the materials file.

For testing:

```
#!c++

gazebo sdf/worlds/robocup09_spl_field.world

```

```
#!c++

gazebo sdf/worlds/robocup14_spl_field.world

```
